details.title: UWB radar for human being detection [same as "UWB radar for human being detection", ibid., vol. 21, n. 11, 06]
details.abstract: UWB radar for detection and positioning of human beings in a complex environment has been developed and manufactured. The novelty of the radar lies in its large operational bandwidth (11.7 GHz at -10 dB level) combined with high time stability. Detection of respiratory movement of a person in laboratory conditions has been demonstrated. Based on experimental results, human being radar return has been analysed in the frequency band from 1 GHz to 12 GHz. The novel principle of human being detection is considered and verified experimentally.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
